sen.j: また新幹線改札が2007年3月27日までは二重改札を行っており、一旦在来線改札を通ってからでないと新幹線改札を通れない構造になっていたり、精算所が改札内に設置されていたりと、改札口周辺の構造は県内の新幹線停車駅の中でも特に複雑になっていた。
sen.e: In addition to the above, due to the fact that passengers had to pass the ticket gate of conventional trains before passing that of Shinkansen as double ticket examination had been conducted until March 27, 2007 as well as the fact that a fare adjustment office was located inside the ticket gate, the structure around the ticket gates of this station was the most complicated one compared with other Shinkansen's stations in Niigata Prefecture.

sen.j: こうした事情もあって、2005年12月に新潟支社管内の主要駅に自動改札機が導入された際にも、長岡駅は設置対象外となった。
sen.e: Under such circumstances, Nagaoka Station was excluded from the list of target stations when automatic ticket checkers were introduced in major stations under Niigata Branch's jurisdiction.
Given such circumstances, Nagaoka Station was excluded from the list of target stations when automatic ticket checkers were introduced in major stations under the jurisdiction of the Niigata Branch.

Given such circumstances, Nagaoka Station was excluded from the list of target stations when automatic ticket checkers were introduced in major stations under the jurisdiction of the Niigata Branch in December 2005.

sen.j: こうした問題から、新潟支社は2006年秋から2007年春にかけて駅舎2階部分を中心に改装工事を実施。
sen.e: In view of the above problems, Niigata Branch carried out the renovation work, from autumn of 2006 until spring of 2007, that centered on the 2nd floor of the station building.
In light of the above problems, the Niigata Branch carried out the renovation work from autumn 2006 until spring 2007, which centered on the second floor of the station building.

sen.j: 2007年3月28日からは新幹線・在来線の改札口がそれぞれ独立して設置され、在来線改札口で自動改札機の供用が開始された。
sen.e: From March 28, 2007, ticket gates of Shinkansen and those of conventional lines became independent and automatic ticket checkers were introduced at the ticket gates of conventional lines.

sen.e: A plan to convert the current bus terminal into a rotary-style bus terminal is under consideration based on the opinion pointing out that the current one is dangerous for users because they are required to cross pedestrian crossings located on the pathway of buses.

sen.j: 最近は、日赤病院の近くに、アピタ長岡店を核としたショッピングセンター、リバーサイド千秋がオープンした為、付近に車庫がある本社営業所担当のバスには土・日・祝日を中心に慢性的な遅れが発生している。
sen.e: After Riverside Senshu, a shopping center whose core store is Apita Nagaoka, opened nearby Nagaoka Red Cross Hospital, chronic delays occur in the operation of buses belonging to the Head Service Office whose carbarn is located nearby, especially on Saturdays, Sundays and national holidays.

Since the Riverside Senshu, a shopping center whose core store is Apita Nagaoka, opened near to Nagaoka Red Cross Hospital, chronic delays have occurred in the operation of buses belonging to the Head Service Office (whose car garage is located nearby), particularly on Saturdays, Sundays and national holidays.

Since the Riverside Senshu, a shopping center whose core store is Apita Nagaoka, opened near to Nagaoka Red Cross Hospital, chronic delays have occurred in the operation of buses belonging to the Head Service Office (whose bus depot is located nearby), particularly on Saturdays, Sundays and national holidays.

sen.j: 1898年（明治31年）6月16日 - 北越鉄道線東三条駅～長岡間開通時に開業。
sen.e: June 16, 1898 - This station commenced operation when Hokuetsu Railway's Higashi-Sanjo⇔Nagaoka section came into operation.
June 16, 1898 - This station commenced operation when Hokuetsu Railway's Higashi-Sanjo⇔Nagaoka section came into operation.
June 16, 1898: This station commenced operation when Hokuetsu Railway Line opened in the section between Higashi-Sanjo Station and Nagaoka Station.

sen.j: 鉄道駅一般駅。
sen.e: General railway station.
General railway station
General railway station

sen.j: 1898年（明治31年）12月27日 - 北越鉄道線が北条駅まで開通。
sen.e: December 27, 1898 - Hokuetsu Railway Line was extended to Kitajo Station.
December 27, 1898 - Hokuetsu Railway Line was extended to Kitajo Station.
December 27, 1898: Hokuetsu Railway Line was extended to Kitajo Station.

sen.j: 1907年（明治40年）8月1日 - 北鉄鉄道鉄道国有法、日本国有鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: August 1, 1907 - Hokuetsu Railway was nationalized pursuant to Railway Nationalization Act and this station became the station of Japan National Railways (JNR).
August 1, 1907 - Hokuetsu Railway was nationalized pursuant to the Railway Nationalization Act, and this station became part of Japan National Railways (JNR).
August 1, 1907: Hokuetsu Railway was nationalized pursuant to the Railway Nationalization Act, and this station became part of Japan National Railways (JNR).

sen.j: 1916年（大正5年）9月9日 - 栃尾鉄道線（後の越後交通栃尾線）が乗り入れ。
sen.e: September 9, 1916 - Tochio Railway Line (Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line) started to run through into the station.
September 9, 1916 - Tochio Railway Line (Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line) started running through, into the station.
September 9, 1916: Tochio Railway Line (later Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line) started running through, into the station.

sen.j: 1947年（昭和22年）10月1日 - 国鉄駅構内電化。
sen.e: October 1, 1947 - Facilities inside the premises of JNR's station were electrified.
October 1, 1947 - The facilities within the premises of JNR's station were electrified.
October 1, 1947: The facilities within the premises of JNR's station were electrified.

sen.j: 1967年（昭和42年）11月15日 - 貨物の取扱を南長岡駅に移管し廃止。
sen.e: November 15, 1967 - Freight service jobs were transferred to Minami-Nagaoka Station.
November 15, 1967 - Freight-service work was transferred to Minami-Nagaoka Station.
November 15, 1967: Freight-service work was transferred to Minami-Nagaoka Station.

sen.j: 1975年（昭和50年）4月1日 - 越後交通栃尾線廃止。
sen.e: April 1, 1975 - Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line was abolished.
April 1, 1975 - The Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line was abolished.
April 1, 1975: The Echigo Kotsu Tochio Line was abolished.

sen.j: 1982年（昭和57年）11月15日 - 上越新幹線が開通、停車駅となる。
sen.e: November 15, 1982 - The Joetsu Shinkansen came into operation and this station became the station where it makes a brief stop.
November 15, 1982 - The Joetsu Shinkansen came into operation, and this station came to serve as a facility for brief stops.
November 15, 1982: The Joetsu Shinkansen came into operation, and this station came to serve as a facility for brief stops.

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）4月1日 - 国鉄分割民営化によりJR東日本が継承。
sen.e: April 1, 1987 - JR East has succeeded the station thanks to the division and privatization of JNR.
April 1, 1987 - JR East succeeded the station due to the division and privatization of JNR.
April 1, 1987: JR East succeeded the station due to the division and privatization of JNR.

sen.j: 2004年（平成16年）10月23日 - 新潟県中越地震で被災。
sen.e: October 23, 2004 -Chuetsu Earthquake hit the station.
October 23, 2004 - The station experienced the effects of the Chuetsu Earthquake.
October 23, 2004: The station experienced the effects of the Chuetsu Earthquake.

sen.j: 東口自由通路の天井が破損し水漏れが発生するなどの被害を受けた。
sen.e: The station suffered the damages such as water leakage from the broken ceiling of free passage at Higashiguchi.
The station suffered damage such as water leakage from the broken ceiling of the free passage at Higashiguchi.
The station suffered damage such as water leakage from the broken ceiling of the free passage at Higashiguchi.

sen.j: その後発生した余震によって駅舎が一時立入禁止となるなど、営業に支障をきたすケースがしばらく続く。
sen.e: The station had been off-limits temporarily due to afterquake and the operation had been impeded for a while.
The station was temporarily off-limits due to aftershocks, and for a while the operation impeded.
The station was temporarily off-limits due to aftershocks, and for a while the operation impeded.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）3月28日 - 在来線改札に自動改札機を設置。
sen.e: March 28, 2007 - Automatic ticket checkers were introduced at the ticket gates of conventional lines.
March 28, 2007 - Automatic ticket checkers were introduced at the ticket gates of conventional lines.

sen.j: 2008年（平成20年）3月15日 - SuicaおよびモバイルSuica特急券のサービス開始。
sen.e: March 15, 2008 - Suica and ticketless service of limited express tickets by Mobile Suica has become available.
